item.title: EP 393 - The Demon Cat Of London!
item.itunes:title: The Demon Cat Of London!
item.description:
Today we get trapped in a haunted McDonalds, try to prevent a tragic accident, and then fight a horned demon cat!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

 

Links:

 

POLICE RESPOND TO REPORT OF MYSTERIOUS “DEMONIC SOUNDS”

https://anomalien.com/police-respond-to-report-of-mysterious-demonic-sounds/

 

Police in Pueblo, Colorado, Respond to Report of "Demonic Sounds" at Local McDonald's

https://www.singularfortean.com/news/2020/2/17/police-in-pueblo-colorado-respond-to-report-of-demonic-sounds-at-local-mcdonalds

 

Pueblo police get report of ‘demonic sounds’ at restaurant

https://www.chieftain.com/news/20200213/pueblo-police-get-report-of-demonic-sounds-at-restaurant

 

Tom Rummel

https://twitter.com/PPDWatchIVCapt/status/1227919392509317120

 

Kevin Tunell Is Paying $1 a Week for a Death He Caused and Finding the Price Unexpectedly High

https://people.com/archive/kevin-tunell-is-paying-1-a-week-for-a-death-he-caused-and-finding-the-price-unexpectedly-high-vol-33-no-15/

 

MADD

https://www.madd.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/Vehicular-Homicide.pdf

 

THE HORNED DEMON CAT OF WORLD WAR II - A TRUE STORY

http://karlshuker.blogspot.com/2012/03/horned-demon-cat-of-world-war-ii-true.html

 

#6 – Horned-Demon Cat

https://backpackerverse.com/paranormal-creatures/

 

Horned Demon Cat

https://cryptidz.fandom.com/wiki/Horned_Demon_Cat

 

British big cats

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_big_cats

 

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Reptilian Strip Song EP 374: “Empty Beds”

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
